Entry.JapaneseText: そのお守り、<Veigue>にとって 本当に大切なものなんだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: That charm of yours must be really important to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……これがあるだけで、 オレは何かに守られている気がする……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... Just by having it with me, I feel as though something is keeping me safe...

Entry.JapaneseText: きっと、クレアさんの想いみたいなのが こもってるんだろうネ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure that Claire poured her heart into it...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何だ？ 何か面白い話か？
Entry.EnglishText: What's up? Are you talking about something interesting?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、もう！ <Tytree>、雰囲気ブチ壊し！ もっと空気読んでよネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Dang it, <Tytree>! Way to ruin the mood! Would it kill you to read the room?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何だよ、いきなり！ おれの存在、全卑定かよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what's the deal?! Why are you guys leaving me high and dry?!
